response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is valued at $12,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you can acquire this product at a special price of $11,000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a significant savings of $1,000 compared to the standard price. Please let me know if you are interested in securing this deal.", "product_price": 11000}
